sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import moment from "moment-timezone"; import { Col, Row, Card, Table, Badge, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import ThemesbergLogo from "assets/img/themesberg.svg"; import { invoiceItems } from "data/tables"; export default () => { const issueDate = moment().subtract(1, "days").format("DD/MM/YYYY"); const dueDate = moment().subtract(1, "days").add(1, "month").format("DD/MM/YYYY"); const subtotal = invoiceItems.reduce((acc, curr) => acc += parseFloat(curr.price) * curr.quantity, 0); const totalDiscount = 20 / 100 * subtotal; const vat = 10 / 100 * (subtotal - totalDiscount); const total = subtotal - totalDiscount + vat; const TableRow = (props) => { const { item, description, price, quantity } = props; const itemTotal = parseFloat(price) * quantity; return ( {item} {description} ${price} {quantity} ${itemTotal.toFixed(2)} ); }; return ( <>

Volt LLC.

112 Washington Square New York, USA company@themesberg.com

Invoice #300500

Paid
Client Information:
Henry M. Pike Themesberg LLC 311 West Mechanic Lane Middletown, NY 10940 name@company.com
Invoice No.
300500
Date issued:
{issueDate}
Due Date:
{dueDate}
 {invoiceItems.map(i => )}
Item Description Price Qty Total
Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Discount (20%) ${totalDiscount.toFixed(2)}
VAT (10%) ${vat.toFixed(2)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}

Payments to:

payment@volt.com ); };
